channel.title: Client Freezes?
channel.description:
I had a server a long time ago and now i just got two sources i liked. When i start them I get this.
Orical-X Client (317) [IMG]http://i1132.photobucket.com/albums/m575/BlahBerrys/1-3.png[/img]
run.bat code
[code]@echo off javaw -cp bin -Xms812m -Xmx1024m client 10 0 highmem members 32 pause [/code]
Link to thread: [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,496594.0.html]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,496594.0.html[/url]
Elemen-X Client (502) [IMG]http://i1132.photobucket.com/albums/m575/BlahBerrys/2-3.png[/img]
run.bat code
[code]@echo off java -cp bin;lib/clientlibs.jar client 0 live english game0 pause [/code]
Link to Thread: [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,484831.0.html]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,484831.0.html[/url]

I had a server a long time ago and now i just got two sources i liked.
